document.full_text: more than 1,600 people showed up to celebrate a german teenager's 16th birthday party after she inadvertently invited the public to attend on facebook, hamburg police said sunday.
document.title: facebook blunder leads crowd to teen's birthday
lines_and_colors: more than 1,600 people showed up to celebrate a german teenager's 16th birthday party after she inadvertently invited the public to attend on facebook, hamburg police said sunday.
